originalText.text: I found Jacob after an unfortunate over-processing color fiasco. I had been looking for a salon in my neighborhood and came upon a different salon where, despite wonderful reviews, my hair was turned into an orange, stripped mess. The next day I found Jacob to see how he could help correct what had been done. The very next day, my hair was back to a healthy glowing and more natural color. Jacob listened, was attentive. and he clearly has skills! I am grateful to have found him and I would highly recommend his work to anyone looking to feel beautiful.

originalText.text:
Jacob has magic in his hands!!! This man is a rockstar!!!

He does not only do an excellent job at picking the perfect color or hairstyle but does his client's hair tastefully!

This place is full of joy and happy vibes

originalText.text: Jacob is a genius. I always know that I can trust whatever he thinks I need for my look. That is saying a lot! I always feel like $1 million when I leave his chair. He simply knows his business better than anyone else. especially if you need color correction, he is your man! He will fix the problem and make it look like there never was one. That’s how good he is.

originalText.text: It was my first appointment with Jacob and it was great! He’s very skilled and gives realistic advice when it comes to your hair goals! He did such a good job on the highlights in my hair and I can’t wait for our next session!!

text.text: It was my first appointment with Jacob and it was great! He’s very skilled and gives realistic advice when it comes to your hair goals! He did such a good job on the highlights in my hair and I can’t wait for our next session!!

originalText.text: Been coming to Jacob for hair color for many years. Ever since he completely fixed a horrific hair coloring job done by another colorists at a different salon. He offers exceptional all around hair care service, is extremely knowledgeable about hair care and always does what is right for you to look your best! Highly recommend him!!
